lines: 1. Muhumbulo muswa ngavhe u tshi nndela,
Zwino ndo no vha tsini na u swika hayani.
Ndo no vha tsini na haya,
Ndo no vha tsini-tsini zwino u fhira zwa kale.
2. Tsini khotsi-anga na haya ha vhudi,
Ndi tsini na khulunoni, henengei tadulu.
3. Tsini na u swika nda rulwa mihwalo,
Ndi tshi sia dzikhakhathi, ndi yo wana khare.
Hu mbo taha mulambo u isaho tshedzani.
5. Khotsi, tika lutendo lwanga lu khwathe,
â€™Si nditshe ndi ndothe khunzikhunzini ya lufu.
